summary: DOOR LOCK CANNOT BE OPENED FOR THE PASSENGER  TO BE ABLE TO GET OUT OF THE CAR IN AN EMERGENCY.  THE PASSENGER IN A HOT CAR HAD TO CRAWL OUT THE DRIVER'S DOOR.  ALSO, THE REAR DOOR COULD NOT BE OPENED TO GET OUT EMERGENCY EQUIPMENT. THIS WAS AN EMERGENCY FOR MY PASSENGER.  THE DRIVERS DOOR AND THE TWO BACK SEAT DOOR DID WORK. DOORS THAT YOU CAN NOT UNLOCK FROM THE INSIDE IS AN EMERGENCY!.
